title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, February 11, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Thomas Edison (Ohio, 1847), who amassed 1,093 patents for inventions including the phonograph, the light bulb, and the movie camera.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Thomas Edison (Ohio, 1847), who amassed 1,093 patents for inventions including the phonograph, the light bulb, and the movie camera.
